# Data Linking

The internal data are linked to various external data sources.

Database naming:

`el_SOURCE_ENTITY`

## VIAF

To [VIAF](http://viaf.org/) by using the `viafr` R-package. 
It suggest a VIAF entity when providing a string.

* db table: `el_viaf_books_authors`
